introduction: AlhaithamAdmonishing InstructionCardWishIn-GameQualityWeaponSwordElementModel TypeDendroTall MaleCharacter RolesOn-FieldDPSBioRelativesVoice ActorsBirthdayFebruary 11thConstel­lationVultur Volans(Story Quest Chapter)RegionSumeruAffil­i­a­tionsSumeru Akademiya(on profile)Haravatat(graduate)Special DishIdeal CircumstanceNamecardAlhaitham: EnlightenmentHow to ObtainEvent Wish — Caution in ConfidenceFeaturedPrevious:Ran 3 months, 15 days agoRelease DateJanuary 18, 20232 years, 11 months agoGenius Invokation TCGCharacter CardStagesBiological ‍ⓘFamily members related by blood lineage (consanguinity) or marriage. Does not include synthetic relatives.‍Grandparent:Alhaitham's Grandmother(deceased)[5]EnglishNazeeh Tarsha[1]ChineseYang Chaoran (杨超然)[2]JapaneseUmehara Yuuichirou (梅原裕一郎)[3]KoreanJun Seung-hwa (전승화)[4]Additional TitlesCategoriesSumeru Akademiya ScribePlayable Characters Alhaithamis a playableDendrocharacterinGenshin Impact. Alhaitham is a member of theHaravatatof theSumeru Akademiyaand the Akademiya's Scribe, responsible for documenting their findings and drafting ordinances. Despite his brilliance, people within the Akademiya are perplexed by Alhaitham due to his unwillingness to aspire for higher office in spite of his egocentricity, and many have been at odds with him for his uncompromising view on rationality and the truth.

introduction: AloySavior From Another WorldCardWishIn-GameQualityWeaponBowElementModel TypeCryoMedium FemaleCharacter RolesOn-FieldDPSBioVoice ActorsBirthdayApril 4thConstel­lationNora FortisAffil­i­a­tionsWandering Heroine (on profile)Adventurers' Guild[1]Special DishSatiety GelNamecardAloy: DawnHow to ObtainReach Adventure Rank 20 (between Versions 2.1–2.2 on PlayStation and Version 2.2 on all platforms)[2]Release DateSeptember 01, 20214 years, 4 months agoEnglishGiselle Fernandez[3]ChineseMufei (沐霏)[4]JapaneseTakagaki Ayahi (高垣彩陽)[4]KoreanJo Hyeon-jung (조현정)[5]Additional TitlesCategoriesNora HuntressPlayable Characters Aloyis a playableCryocrossovercharacterinGenshin Impact. She is the heroine from theHorizonseries and was introduced as a limited-time collaboration and crossover character between Guerrilla Games andHoYoverse.

sections.Availability: All Travelers who had reachedAdventure Rank20 or above were able to claim Aloy for free directly through the in-gamemail. PlayStation users were able to obtain Aloy early between Versions 2.1–2.2, while all platforms were eligible duringVersion 2.2.[2]
